5.なんと <%sL_RECIPE>が|<%nL_NUM>個 できた！<me 71>: Oh my god, we got <%sL_RECIPE> and <%nL_NUM>!<me 71>|<bw_break>

6.なんと <%sL_RECIPE>が|ひとつ できた！<me 71>|<bw_br: Oh my god, we got one <%sL_RECIPE>!<me 71>|<bw_break>

7.現在 装備しているものが|素材に ふくまれています！|装備を外して 錬金しても: The item you're currently equipped with is|buried in your materials! May I remove the|equipment and smelt it?<yesno><break>

8.このレシピの素材を入れて|<%sL_RECIPE>を 錬金しますか？|<yesn: Do you want to alchemize <%sL_RECIPE> with|the ingredients of this recipe?<yesno><break>

9.<%sL_STORAGE>が いっぱいです！|持ちものを 売るか あずけるかして: <%sL_STORAGE> is full! Sell or surrender your|possessions, then smelt them...<bw_break>

10.<%sL_RECIPE>を 錬金するには|素材が 足りません。|<br>|どのア: I don't have enough materials to smelt|<%sL_RECIPE>... Which item do you want to|alchemize?<break>

12.このレシピの素材を入れて|<%sL_RECIPE>を <%nL_NUM>個 錬金: Do you want to alchemize <%nL_NUM> of|<%sL_RECIPE> with the ingredients of this|recipe?<yesno><break>

13.銀色に輝く釜がある。|この釜を使って 錬金をしますか？|<yesno><brea: A silvery cauldron... Would you like to use|this cauldron for alchemy?<yesno><break>

15.しかし そのカギは すでに持っている！|<br>|どのアイテムを 錬金しますか？: But you already have the key! Which item|would you like to alchemize?<break>
